rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Eviviva enters or attacks, destroy up to two artifacts, creatures, or planeswalkers controlled by different players. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. They may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
